comments: The answer presents a highly structured and visionary approach, clearly articulating a comprehensive strategic plan that balances compliance with innovation decisively. The proposal for cross-functional councils, embedding compliance in the design process, and fostering proactive regulator engagement demonstrates excellent communication and stakeholder management. The dual-track funding model and real-time regulatory intelligence show adaptability and foresight in navigating changing regulatory conditions. Overall, this response reflects an exceptional level of leadership suitable for extraordinary organizational performance.
